alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:43PM CDT until June 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NANCE...NORTHEASTERN MERRICK AND NORTHEASTERN POLK COUNTIES... At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Genoa, or 17 miles west of Columbus, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported golf ball hail and 60 mph winds near Genoa at 737 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Genoa and Silver Creek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
